sentence: move the left red block to the center left
straighten and move the purple block at the center to the back of the purple block behind the red block
pick up the purple block in front of the block you just moved and place it on top of the red block in front of it
move the front gold block between the blocks that you moved before
pick up the leftmost purple block that you have not moved yet and place it to the right side of the moved red block
move the rear red block to the right side of the block that you moved just before
